EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Partner Flash - your quarterly news
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> SEPTEMBER 2018 Partner Flash - your quarterly news In this issue: Program News <[[#programnews]]> | Success Stories <[[#success]]> | Featured Product <[[#product]]> | Partner Spotlight <[[#spotlight]]> | Videos <[[#videos]]> | Tools <[[#tools]]> | Featured Training <[[#training]]> | Events <[[#events]]> | Upcoming Events <[[#upcoming]]> Program News Nokia’s Transportation, Energy and Public Sector (TEPS) lead speaks on our Enterprise TEPS strategy The Enterprise Market is in a new disrupted state. Most organizations now recognize the power of digitization and the ability to significantly impact cost efficiencies (save money) and reinvent the economic model (make money). “Enterprise organizations are certainly at the stage where they are aware of the need to disrupt their own business practices or face disruption from their competition”. – Chris Johnson, Head of Global TEPS Read interview → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000DmIGyAAN]]>Enterprise marketing strategy interview → <[[http://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0684100000D5pgtAAB]]> Partner 1st strategy interview → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=06941000007DqgsAAC]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> GDPR is here … and it probably concerns you as well The General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) entered into force in the European Union on 25 May 2018. Its articles govern individuals’ right to privacy and personal data, representing the most significant overhaul of data protection legislation within the EU in the last 23 years. Nokia is committed to protect and respect personal data and privacy and to comply with the applicable data protection and privacy laws worldwide. Nokia Privacy Policy → <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/privacy]]>Nokia Commercial Third Party Code of Conduct → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000CDhfLAAT]]>Nokia Ethics Hotline → <[[http://www.nokia.ethicspoint.com/]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Success Stories Optical LAN in Hospitality To provide hotel guests with seamless connectivity and services anywhere in the hotel, Nokia and Optical LAN partner, South Korea’s Netcurity, are deploying a fiber-based networking solution that provides a Local Area Network (LAN) which is more flexible, scalable and secure than a traditional copper-based LAN technology. Press release → <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/news/releases/2018/08/09/nokia-optical-lan-solution-enables-south-koreas-jeju-shinhwa-world-to-deliver-superior-guest-experiences?utm_source=PR&utm_medium=social&utm_content=Hootsuite]]>Webpage → <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/nokia-optical-lan]]>Brochure → <[[https://onestore.nokia.com/asset/192382]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Nokia wins State Grid Corporation of China (SGCC) optical transport network upgrade in Beijing and Tianjin The Nokia 1830 Photonic Service Switch (PSS) is at the core of the new SGCC optical transport network and will help the customer to meet growing bandwidth capacity demands and pave the way for future smart grid developments serving over 1.1 billion people in 26 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities covering 88 percent of China. Press release → <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/news/releases/2018/05/31/nokia-wins-state-grid-corporation-of-china-optical-transport-network-upgrade-in-beijing-and-tianjin]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Nokia officially selected as the Backbone transport network supplier for MRT Line2 (MRT2). MRT2 is a 37-station MRT Line in Malaysia running over 52.2km covering Sungai Buloh-Kuala Lumpur-Serdang-Putrajaya. Huawei, ZTE, OTN Systems, and Nokia were invited to respond to the tender. The solution covers core IP/MPLS routers and access switches from ION. IP Routing webpage → <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/ip-routing]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> First reference for a subsea capacity upgrade with a large enterprise customer in APAC SEAX deployed a new cable – SEAX1 – which follows an innovative route to cut the transmission cost between Malaysia and Singapore and Indonesia. Nokia is the only vendor selected to supply SLTE equipment for this cable based on 1830 PSS which can integrate terrestrial and subsea network delivering dramatic Capex and Opex savings 1830 PSS on Partner Portal → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/article/1830-Photonic-Service-Switch-PRM]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Featured Product Add connectivity muscle to your customer’s network with Wavence Traditional microwave networks are under pressure to support the growing adoption of packet-based applications and services. Voice demand is shifting to data demand as mobile subscribers surf the Internet, download apps and consume mobile video. Your customers need cost-effective and reliable solutions that maximize radio link performance, support advanced packet networking and simplify operations. If you have been certified to sell Wavence and would like to learn more, marketing assets are available. Video → <[[https://onestore.nokia.com/asset/192899]]>Read case study → <[[https://onestore.nokia.com/asset/193189]]>Nokia webpage → <[[https://networks.nokia.com/products/wavence]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Partner Spotlight Welcome to our new partners Nokia welcomes Westcon-Comstor Philippines to the Nokia Global Partner Program to market, distribute and service Nokia’s optical LAN solution, in a bid to deliver improved service experience, lower costs and improve network performance. Press release → <[[https://sg.channelasia.tech/article/645170/nokia-expands-westcon-comstor-alliance-into-philippines/]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Videos The evolution of SDN to meet enterprise needs Sunil Khandekar, Nuage Networks CEO, discusses the needs of Enterprises today and how SDN combines agility, security and flexibility to fulfill those needs. The Nuage Networks VSP has established itself as the industry's leading SDN and SD-WAN platform and Sunil touches on key aspects of the solution that differentiates it from the rest. Video interview → <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sVO8B2e4IwU]]> Nuage Network SD-WAN webpage → <[[http://www.nuagenetworks.net/enterprise/software-defined-wan/]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Tools NEW! New Partner Portal functionality Introducing new functionality designed to improve your experience with a single, easy to access consolidated tool platform. Fully integrating the Nokia Co-op platform into our Salesforce based Portal provides easy access to and management of your Co-op account. Explore Co-op on the Partner Portal today. Partner Portal → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> NEW! Co-op tool now available in the Partner Portal Co-op has been fully integrated on the Partner Portal and is now available through a Partner Portal App or directly from the main menu of your Partner account. Co-op is no longer accessed from a link to an external tool. All co-op accruals, activities and claims have been transferred. As a result, Co-op users can continue from where they were before the migration. Dedicated training on how to use the new Co-op tool can be accessed from the Partner Portal within the Topic Catalog under Partner Portal Training. Job aids including How to Create and Submit a Co-op Activity, how to Edit an Activity and How to upload PoP and Submit a Claim for Reimbursement, as well as the End to End Co-op Process Training pdf are available for download. If you need support on how to use the new Co-op functionality on the Partner Portal, please contact your PSM or GSS with any questions. GSS → <[[mailto:gss.partnersupport@nokia.com]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> NEW! Do you sell in multiple countries? Expanded Nokia Indirect Reseller Application (NIRA) allows partners to apply to sell in multiple countries via a single application, simplifying the application and compliance approval process. PRM Training → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/article/PRM-Training-PRM]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> NEW! Social Media channels Nokia has 2 new social media accounts: Nokia for enterprise on Twitter, and Nokia for enterprise on LinkedIN. Join the 5,000 followers to stay connected with the latest news. Follow Nokia for enterprise on Twitter → <[[https://twitter.com/nokiaenterprise]]> Follow Nokia for enterprise on LinkedIN → <[[https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/nokia-enterprise/]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Featured Training New Training content available Visit and bookmark the Partner Learning Store <[[https://learningstore.nokia.com/partner/]]> to investigate new and updated training on products, solutions, tools and process. New offerings include: Co-op → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000Dm5bKAAR]]>Task Management → <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000Dm5aqAAB]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Become Optical LAN (POL) certified Becoming partner certified is probably much easier than you think! All web-based training is free for all your employees and for Instructor-Led or Virtual specialized training where there is an associated cost, Co-op funds can be used. This quarter we feature Optical LAN training. Become a certified Sales Associate or Sales Engineer Specialist in about half a day and you will know how to help your customers bring their LAN up to light speed. Fiber is the future. Are you ready? Optical LAN Training → <[[https://learningstore.nokia.com/partner/#Home]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Events Westcon Technology Summit This year’s summit featured the most advanced security technologies from Next-Gen Firewall, Artificial Intelligence (AI) based Threat Prevention, Unified Communications and Collaboration, Cloud-based Security to Advanced Data protection & Encryption. Nokia was a sponsor for the Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia and Philippines events, showcasing the Passive Optical LAN (POL) solution. Michael Siaw, Nokia Business Development POL and Services, presented how POL addresses various challenges in hospitality and real estate. The event attracted more than 800 global attendees, including top influencers and senior management. Partner Roadshows in APJI Australia, Sydney, Melbourne, Manila and Seoul saw strong participation from across our partners including VARs, Alliances, Service providers and Distributors. Highly insightful presentations by our speakers on our commitment to public sector, innovations in energy, investments in transportation, huge opportunities in Enterprise and more generated high interest and were well-received. Future roadshows planned in Jakarta, Singapore (at SReXperts), Kuala Lumpur and Bangkok (at GTFF). Upcoming SReXperts event in Singapore → <[[http://srexperts2018.conferenceworks.com.au/]]> Back to top > <[[#top]]> Upcoming Events InnoTrans <[[https://www.innotrans.de/en/]]>
18 – 21 September Berlin, Germany
SDN – NFV World Congress <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/news/events/sdn-nfv-world-congress-2018]]>
08 – 12 October The Hague, Netherlands
Broadband World Forum <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/news/events/broadband-world-forum-2018]]> 23 – 25 October Berlin, Germany
European Utility Week <[[https://networks.nokia.com/events/2018/european-utility-week-2018]]>
06 – 08 November Vienna, Austria
AfricaCom <[[https://www.nokia.com/en_int/news/events/africacom-2018]]>
13 – 18 November Cape Town, South Africa
GTFF
28 – 29 November Bangkok, Thailand Back to top > <[[#top]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
